tweet: Mark: I don't know what it is with us insomniacs. I just don't know what it is. I just don't know what. I don't know. I don't.
Jen: I can't sleep because my husband is cheating on me with his secretary and I hate him for it, but I know I will never leave him.
Felipe: I can't sleep because I am so much in my head all the time. Thoughts keep spinning, theories keep forming, and I'm left sleepless.
Dreams permit each and every one of us to be quietly and safely insane every night of our lives. ~ William Dement
Alyssa42: Deep at night, when I am restless in my bed, all the things that matter so much during the day lose their focus and importance.
